member.name: M:Zebble.NavBarPage.ShowMenuDespiteBackButton
member.summary: Determines whether the menu should be displayed even if a back button is displayed.

member.name: F:Zebble.Tabs.Tab.UseNavForward
member.summary: When set true uses the Nav.Forward() for navigating. Otherwise it will be a Nav.Go()

member.name: M:Zebble.Tabs.Tab.SetSelected(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This is the same as setting the Selected property, but allows you to await it.
